content: A Veteran is someone who, at one point in his life wrote a blank check Made payable to "The United States of America" for an amount of "up to and including my life." Awesome, and so true.
reply: A Veteran is someone who, at one point in his life wrote a blank check Made payable to "The United States of America" for an amount of "up to and including my life." Awesome, and so true.
title: BEST Defintion of a Veteran that I have ever heard...
